channel.title: Project03 on Matthew Fabian
channel.description: Recent content in Project03 on Matthew Fabian

item.title: Privacy Reflection
item.description: The technology challenges showed me just how much information one can inadvertently share with the world. As a relatively private person, I did find it somewhat concerning that I was unaware of a few of the information “leaks”. Ultimately though, there were few things that I changed about my technology habits. I already had most apps on my phone locked down, but there were a few that I changed from location “Always On” to “Only When Using.

item.title: Privacy Paradox
item.description: I collaborated with Monica Fallon to create this podcast. My reflection can be found here.
